item.title: Sound Fixes Pack v25.02 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | February 4, 2025

Sound Fixes Pack v25.02 ETS2

CHANGELOG v25.02
Comprehensive sounds added to the EMD G16 train locomotive. [ETS2 edition]
Comprehensive sounds added to the AnsaldoBreda Frecciarossa ETR 1000 train. [ETS2 edition]
Comprehensive sounds added to the 1999 KONƒåAR TCDD E 52516 train. [ETS2 edition]
Comprehensive sounds added to the T√úLOMSA≈û TCDD E 68 000 train. [ETS2 edition]
Comprehensive sounds added to the 2012 Hyundai Rotem TCDD E32000 electric multiple unit. [ETS2 edition]
Comprehensive sounds added to the 2014 CAF Inneo BM3 metro train. [ETS2 edition]
Comprehensive sounds added to the 2008 ƒåKD Tatra T3A tram. [ETS2 edition]
2015 ≈†koda Superb (B8) TDI sound set is now the default sound set for car_default_3.soundref in AI traffic. [ETS2 edition]
2015 ≈†koda Superb (B8) TDI sound set is now the default sound set for car_normal_1.soundref in AI traffic. [ETS2 edition]
2013 Renault Captur (J87 generation) sound set is now the default sound set for car_default_4.soundref in AI traffic. [ETS2 edition]
Minor sound adjustments to some AI traffic car sounds. [ETS2 edition]
2015 Ford Mustang GT Premium sound set is now the default sound set for car_sport_1.soundref in AI traffic.
2016 Chevrolet Camaro SS Coupe sound set is now the default sound set for car_sport_2.soundref in AI traffic. [ATS edition]

DESCRIPTION
This mod has been bringing more immersion to common sounds in the game for over 9 years!
It packs a variety of sound content within one mod, making it great value within the 100 mod limit in Convoy multiplayer.

COMPATIBILITY
‚Äì ETS2 1.53.3 + ATS 1.53.2. No errors in game log. Must have high priority in Mod Manager.
‚Äì Does not replace individual player truck sounds, so this mod can be used with an unlimited amount of truck sound mods of your choice.
‚Äì Compatible with all maps and all trucks, including truck mods.
‚Äì Supported in single-player and multiplayer Convoy mode, and is marked as an optional mod in Convoy.

MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS
Requires higher priority in Mod Manager than:
‚Äì any map mods (e.g. ProMods)
‚Äì any AI traffic mods (e.g. traffic packs and traffic pack add-ons)
‚Äì any rain sound mods

FEATURE LIST
The mod features meticulously crafted sounds, covering the following:

‚Äì Suspension and tire bump sounds for your truck and trailer.
‚Äì Fuel / filling station sounds.
‚Äì Door close and seatbelt sounds after refueling.
‚Äì Train sound enhancements for several locomotives and railroad cars.
‚Äì Country/state specific railroad crossing bell sounds.
‚Äì The most complete tire sound package for all terrains: asphalt, gravel, grass, snow, and sleeper lines.
‚Äì Wet tire sound for the player‚Äôs truck tires when the asphalt roads are wet.
‚Äì Reworked tire screech/skid sound effects.
‚Äì Nokia phone ringtone sound replacing the hurry up / late music, leading to less stress for the player.
‚Äì Default common sound reworks, such as improved default air brake sounds.
‚Äì AI traffic vehicle sound improvements, with engine and horn sounds uniquely set for specific vehicles.
‚Äì English AU/UK/US voice navigation variants with speaker effect added and uncustomary phrases removed.
‚Äì Wind buffeting and rush of air sounds at high speeds only when the window is open.
‚Äì More environmental and ambient sounds, and tasteful changes to existing ambient sounds in the game world.
‚Äì Trailer coupling, trailer brace rotation, and trailer sliding axle sounds.
‚Äì 5 standalone air horns.
‚Äì Dynamic rain sounds, and an assortment of different thunder sounds with delay.
‚Äì Default gear grinding sound effect additions and improvements.
‚Äì Stronger reverb effects when under bridges and overpasses.
‚Äì (ATS only) Drawbridge lift warning sound for the Columbia River Interstate Bridge.
‚Äì (ATS only) Working sounds for the Musical Road on the Historic Route 66.
‚Äì (Optional) Reefer / refrigerated trailer sound functionality.
‚Äì (Optional ‚Äì ATS only) Cop scouting reports via CB radio (enable in voice navigation options).
‚Äì Fixes for World Ambient sound glitches from the vanilla game and/or mods.

For further immersion, the mod may also include official paint colors and more authentic specifications for each AI traffic vehicle it modifies for sound. Rarer paint colors are less likely to be seen.

Credits: SCS Software, Drive Safely, antonvezdehod, Darkcaptain, Frontiersman, Grinch, Katixa, Kriechbaum, Max2712, Trayscapes, Vasily (Engine Voice Records), Zeemod

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it‚Äôs easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: ‚ÄúMy Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod‚Äù folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: ‚ÄúMy Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod‚Äù folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: MB Actros MP2-MP3 440 OM501 Sound Pack v1.1 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | February 4, 2025

MB Actros MP2-MP3 440 OM501 Sound Pack v1.1 ETS2

The sound pack replaces the original ETS2 sound files for the OM501 LA V6 engines for the following trucks: the Mercedes Actros by SCS, the Mercedes Actros MP2 by Dotec and the Mercedes Actros MP3 by Dotec.
Furthermore, the sound pack features 4 standalone OM501 V6 engines, ranging from 408 to 476 hp, with true-to-real life engine parameters, torque curves, and a variety of matching MB Powershift 2 and Telligent/EPS transmissions.

Please note:
In order to experience the fullest sound experience, turn on both ‚Äúreverb effects‚Äù in the audio settings of ETS2!
For ETS2 1.53.x

Credits: max2712

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it‚Äôs easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: ‚ÄúMy Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod‚Äù folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: ‚ÄúMy Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod‚Äù folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: BC-Interior Belka Accessory v0.7.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | February 4, 2025

BC-Interior Belka Accessory v0.7.0 ETS2

Changes v0.7.0
Redesigned windshield curtans, new model, fringe textures, three new variants
Redesigned side curtains, new model new option (Slot toy on seat)
Redesigned Daf 2021 pins slots + Daf XD 2021 support
Added ‚Äúpalm‚Äù to the windshield
Added slots for poppy ‚Äúcaps‚Äù on tables
Added new system: plate the windshield (installation via slots in lightboxes)
Added new system: slots for air freshener on the deflector.
Added new system: accessories in sleeper, on the floor (slots only) (no new models)

Full support for the new version and systems:
Volvo FH3 2009 Jhonny
Volvo FH 2012 SCS, removed support Rework Eugeny
Volvo FH 2021/2024 SCS
Iveco Sway SCS, removed support for Sway by Truck Custom
Daf NG XD/XF/XG + Rework Jasper
Man Tgx 2020 SCS

The modification includes:
‚Äì Tables for trucks
‚Äì Stickers on the windshield and side windows
‚Äì pins
‚Äì slots on the panel and windshield Dashboard mat,
‚Äì Ambient interior lighting (located in the beacons slot (turned on together with the side markers)) + main light (in addition to the background lighting +Basic) (turned on from the flashing beacons button (default O)
‚Äì Side curtains and curtains on the windshield
‚Äì Air freshener ‚ÄúPoppy‚Äù and ‚ÄúPoppy mini‚Äù Caps on the panel
‚Äì Hanging air fresheners ‚ÄúPoppy‚Äù,‚ÄùAreon‚Äù and others
‚Äì Air freshener ‚ÄúPoppy Mini‚Äù on the deflector
‚Äì Lightboxes on glass
‚Äì Triangle pennants
‚Äì Pennant ‚Äúmini scarf‚Äù
‚Äì Hanging dice and more‚Ä¶

Fully tested for 1.53

Credits: Belka647

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it‚Äôs easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: ‚ÄúMy Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod‚Äù folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: ‚ÄúMy Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod‚Äù folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.
